amendment.description: Amendment provides that the Federal share of a grant may not exceed 90 percent of the costs of a program or proposal.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 8 in the Congressional Record of February 10, 1995) to require each local government receiving law enforcement block grants under the bill to provide at least 10 percent of the funds as matching funds.
